src_original: so 'pi dvividho draṣṭavyaḥ - bāhyaśca ādhyātmikaśca //
tgt_original: 復應作二義觀之： 一外、二內。

src_original: atha ca satsu pratyayeṣu kāyasyotpattirbhavati //  tatra pṛthivīdhāturnātmā (na mukto na baddho)
tgt_original: 其地性者，堅相，能成身、使身不敗。

src_original: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamaḥ?
tgt_original: 其外因緣從因義。 何者？

src_original: (evaṃ abdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhāturnātmā.............. nāpyanyasya kasyacit) //  tatrāvidyā katamā?
tgt_original: 其地性非我、非眾生、非命、非男非女、非自非他，如是乃至識性。

src_original: yā eṣveva ṣaḍdhātuṣu ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā sattvajīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavasaṃjñā
tgt_original: 如是六性緣具故，有眾生想、常想恒想、有想、吾我想、婬欲想、我想。

src_original: evamādi vividhamajñānam,  iyamucyate avidyeti /
tgt_original: 如是等類種種無知，稱為無明。

src_original: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /
tgt_original: 有此無明故，於境則生愛著、則生瞋恚、則生癡。

src_original: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣu,  amī ucyante saṃskārā iti //
tgt_original: 此等貪瞋癡依境故起，則稱為行。

src_original: vastuprajñaptiḥ(indriyavijñānacetanā) vijñānam //
tgt_original: 隨事分別，故名為識。

src_original: yadidaṃ bījādaṅkuraḥ,  patrātkāṇḍam,  kāṇḍānnāḍam,  nāḍāddaṇḍaḥ,  daṇḍādgarbhaḥ,  śūkātpuṣpam,  puṣpātphalamiti /
tgt_original: 一切過去未來諸佛種智，同說如是，以從種生芽、從芽生葉、從葉生節、從節生莖、從莖生幹、從幹生枝、從枝生蕚、從蕚生花、從花生子。

src_original: vijñānasahajāścatvāra upādānaskandhāḥ,  tannāmarūpam /
tgt_original: 從此識故復生四陰，即是名色。

src_original: nāmarūpasaṃśritānīndriyāṇi ṣaḍāyatanam /
tgt_original: 依名色故有諸根，以此稱為六入。

src_original: trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ,  (viṣayendriyavijñānasaṃnipāta ityarthaḥ) /  sparśānubhāvo vedanā /  vedanādhyavasānaṃ tṛṣṇā(adhyavasānaṃ kāṅkṣā sukhādyanubhavaḥ) /  tṛṣṇāvaipulyamupādānam /  upādānanirjātaṃ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma bhavaḥ /  bhavahetukaḥ skandhaprādurbhāvo jātiḥ /
tgt_original: 此聚集故有觸，覺觸故想，想後故愛，愛增廣故取，依取故生後有，業有生故有有，以業為因故有陰，陰起故生、陰熟故老、陰壞故死、內煩熱故憂、思想故悲、身識陰和會故苦。

src_original: skandhavināśo maraṇam /  mriyamāṇasya mūḍhasya sābhiṣvaṅgasyāntardāhaḥ śokaḥ /  śokenālapanaṃ paridevanam /  cakṣurādipañcavijñānakāyasaṃyuktaṃ asātānuśayanaṃ duḥkhapaścāttāpaṃ duḥkha(m) /
tgt_original: 其闇義故無明，其造作義故行，識義故識，堅立義故名色，入門義故六入，觸義故觸，領取義故受，愛取義故取，更生後有義故有，起義故生，熟義故老，壞義故死，煩熱義故憂，思想義故悲，逼惱身義故苦。

src_original: manasikāra saṃprayuktaṃ mānasaṃ duḥkha(m)  daurmanasyam /  ye cāpyanye evamādayaḥ kleśāḥ,  upakleśā upāyāsāḥ (manovikalpajātamāyāśāṭhyadainyakāmarāgādayaste sarve / peyālam) //
tgt_original: 逼惱心義故不適，隨煩惱分義故苦惱。

src_original: punaraparam - tattve 'pratipattiḥ mithyāpratipattirajñānam (saṃvṛtiparamārthayorvibhāgājñānaṃ ajñānam) /  avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante - puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā aniñjyopagāśceti saṃbhāvyante avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /
tgt_original: 如是不隨實相故則隨邪行，無知故則無明，如是無明故生三種行，則是善、不善、無記。 故言無明緣行。

src_original: puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati,  apuṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ apuṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ (MŚālSū, Vaidya 112)  bhavati, aniñjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmaniñjyo pagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /  idamucyate saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānamiti //  tadevaṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam //
tgt_original: 有如是等行故，有善識、不善識、無記識，以是故行緣識。 以有善從識故則生，從善名色、不善及無記亦如是生，識緣故稱為名色。

src_original: nāmarūpavivṛddhyā ṣaḍbhirāyatagadvāraiḥ kṛtyakriyā(ḥ)  tannāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamucyate //
tgt_original: 名色增長故，有六門作所應作等知智，名色緣故稱為六入。

src_original: ṣaḍbhya āyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyasamūhāḥ pravartante,  ayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa ucyate //
tgt_original: 六觸入故生六觸，緣此六入故稱為觸。

src_original: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati,  tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate,  iyaṃ sparśapratyayā vedanā ucyate //  yastāṃ vedanā (vedayāti)  viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasa(sya?)  ti (kāṅkṣati)
tgt_original: 此觸生故故生受，故稱緣觸生受，領取諸緣味著故名受。

src_original: adhitiṣṭhati,  sā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇetyucyate //  āsvādanābhinandanaṃ ādhyavasāyasthānam,  na me priyarūpasātarūpaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇairviyogo bhavatu aparityāgaḥ,  bhūyobhūyaśca prārthanā,
tgt_original: 緣受故稱為愛，歡悅耽著好色染味名色不能捨離，深更貪求此等，稱為愛。 緣愛故取，欲更希求後有，因身口意業故，稱取緣有。

src_original: idaṃ tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānamityucyate //  evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena manasā vācā,  sa upādānapratyayo bhava ityucyate //  yat karmanirjātānāṃ skandhānāmabhinirvṛttiḥ,  sā bhavapratyayā jātirityucyate //
tgt_original: 依業故生陰，此是緣有故生。

src_original: yo jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānāmupacayaparipākādvināśo bhavati,  tadidaṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamityucyate /
tgt_original: 此陰生起故有熟壞，故稱生緣老死。

src_original: tatra vijñānaṃ bījasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /  karma kṣetrasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /  avidyā tṛṣṇā ca kleśasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /
tgt_original: 無明、愛、業、識也。 其識種子有，為因其名色者，業及田為因，無明愛為煩惱因。

src_original: karmakleśā vijñānabījaṃ janayanti /
tgt_original: 無此業煩惱故，識種子不生長。

src_original: tatra karma vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karoti,  tṛṣṇā vijñānabījaṃ snehayati,  avidyā vijñānabījamavakirati /  satāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ vijñānabījasya abhinirvṛttirbhavati /
tgt_original: 則此因，業識種子為田，無明故散識種子，愛故潤識種子。

src_original: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti /  tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /  avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /  vijñānabījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayai (pratītyotpādai)
tgt_original: 其無明亦不生念言我能散識種子，愛亦不念言我能潤識種子，業亦不念言我於識為田用，識種子亦不念言我緣此等故生。

src_original: api tu vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhisyanditamavidyāvakīrṇaṃ virohati /  nāmarūpāṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati //
tgt_original: 復次，識種子安住業田中，為愛所潤漬，無明為密覆，故種子生長，生名色芽於一切無生陰。

src_original: sa cāsau nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto nākāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ
tgt_original: 則此名色芽，亦非自造、亦非他造、亦非俱造、亦非自在天造、亦非無因生。

src_original: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogāt ṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyādāsvādātprabuddhaṃ (MŚālSū, Vaidya 113)  vijñānabījaṃ tatratropapattyā mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati,
tgt_original: 有如上業煩惱故，識種子增長生名色芽，亦不從此世度於後世而有，隨從業果因緣備足故。

src_original: hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /  (peyālam, peyālaśabdena sāvaśeṣaṃ nirdiśati) //
tgt_original: 如是此身於此處滅、於彼處生，有業因緣隨逐備足故。

src_original: rūpamālambanakṛtyaṃ karoti,  āloko 'vabhāsakṛtyaṃ karoti,  ākāśamanāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti,  tajjamanasikāraḥ samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 如是色為眼識緣境、明為開導、空為不礙，如是生意；

src_original: asatsu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānaṃ notpadyate /
tgt_original: 無如是緣則識不生。

src_original: yadā cakṣurādhyātmikamāyatanamavikalaṃ bhavati,
tgt_original: 若眼入無𨵗，色等外塵則為緣對、明為開導、空為無礙，生意緣，則依意所作。

src_original: evaṃ rūpālokākāśatajjamanasikārāścāvikalā bhavanti,  tataḥ sarveṣāṃ samavāyāccakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati /
tgt_original: 如是眼、色、明、空、生意緣和合故生眼識。

src_original: tatrāpi cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya āśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti /  rūpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya avalambanakṛtyaṃ karomīti /  ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya avabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /  ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya anāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /  tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /  cakṣurvijñānasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayasamavāyairjanita iti /
tgt_original: 則此眼亦不念言我能為眼識作依，色亦不念言我能為眼識作緣，境明亦不念言我為眼識作明導，空亦不念言我能為眼識作無礙，生意緣亦不念言我能為眼識作意緣。

src_original: asati bīje aṅkuro na bhavati,  evaṃ yāvat asati puṣpe phalaṃ na bhavati /
tgt_original: 若無子則不生芽，如是無花則不生子。

src_original: evaṃ ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ //
tgt_original: 如是內因緣從緣義，應如是觀其內因緣義。

src_original: (MŚālSū, Vaidya 114) tatra ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ /  katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ?
tgt_original: 應作五事觀察。

src_original: yaduta na śāśvatataḥ,  nocchedataḥ,  na saṃkrāntitaḥ,  parittahetutaḥ vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ,  tatsadṛśānubandhataśceti /
tgt_original: 非常、非斷、非傳度、藉緣故果實增廣、從相似生。

src_original: sati tu bīje aṅkurasya abhinirvṛttirbhavati,  evaṃ yāvat sati ca puṣpe phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /  tatra ca punarbījasya naivaṃ bhavati - ahamaṅkuraṃ nirvartayāmīti /  etena nirīhatvam /
tgt_original: 有子故得生芽，如是有花故得生子。

src_original: ato hetorna śāśvatataḥ //  kathaṃ punarnocchedataḥ?  na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu maraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,  nāpyaniruddheṣu /
tgt_original: 所以者何？ 臨死之陰滅故非常。

src_original: api tu maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante,  tasminneva samaye aupapattikāśca skandhāḥ punarbhavanti,  prādurbhavanti,  tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat /  ato nocchedataḥ //  kathaṃ na saṃkrāntita iti?
tgt_original: 即此時死陰滅故，更生餘陰中無間缺，如稱低起，故非斷。

src_original: visadṛśāt sattvanikāyāt visabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantareṣvabhinirvartante,  ato na saṃkrāntitaḥ //
tgt_original: 以非相似故從初心更生勝心，故非傳度。

src_original: kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ?  parīttaṃ karma kriyate,  vipulaphalavipāko 'nubhūyate,  ataḥ parittahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ //
tgt_original: 緣作小業受大果報，故稱藉緣故果實增廣。

src_original: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /  evaṃ yāvatpuṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti /  phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ puṣpeṇābhinirvartita iti /  atha bīje sati ca kāraṇabhūte aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvo bhavati,  evaṃ yāvatpuṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvo bhavati /
tgt_original: 如此，子亦不言我能生芽、芽亦不言我能自生，如是一切法如理而安。

src_original: evaṃ ca bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ //  (MŚālSū, Vaidya 109) punaḥ kathaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ?
tgt_original: 以是義故，外因緣從因義，應如是觀，此是觀因義。 觀緣義者何！

src_original: tatra pṛthividhāturbījasya saṃdhāraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti,
tgt_original: 其地性者，能受種子。

src_original: abdhāturbījaṃ snehayati,  tejodhāturbījaṃ paripācayati,  vāyudhāturbījamabhinirharati,
tgt_original: 水性者，能潤種子。 火性者，能熟種子。 風性者，能增長種子。

src_original: ākāśadhāturbījasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti,
tgt_original: 空性者，能為種子作無礙。

src_original: ṛturapi bījasya pariṇāmakṛtyaṃ karoti /  asatsu pratyayeṣu bījādaṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirna bhavati /  yadā bāhyaśca pṛthivīdhāturavikalo bhavati,  evamaptejovāyvākāśaṛtudhātavaścāvikalā bhavanti,  tatasteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ samavāyādbīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
tgt_original: 若離此緣則種子不生，如地性能受種子、水性能潤種子、火性能熟種子、風性能增長種子、空性能無礙種子，賴時節故種子增長，種子增長故生芽。

src_original: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījasya dhāraṇākṛtyaṃ karomi iti /  evaṃ yāvadṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomi iti /  aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
tgt_original: 其地性者亦不言我能受種子、水性者亦不言我能潤種子、火性者亦不言我能熟種子、空性者亦不言我能為種子作無礙、種子亦不念言我藉此等緣能得增長。

src_original: atha punaḥ satsu pratyayeṣu teṣu bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
tgt_original: 若離此緣，種子則不能生芽。

src_original: sa cāyamaṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto nākāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaśca  pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśadhātusamavāyādbije nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /  evaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ //
tgt_original: 其此芽亦非自作、亦非共作、亦非自在天作、亦非無因生，皆從地水火風空種子時節故生芽。

src_original: tatra bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ /  katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ?
tgt_original: 此外因緣應作五事觀察：

src_original: na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti /
tgt_original: 非常、非斷、非傳度、藉緣故果實增廣、從相似生。

src_original: kathaṃ na śāśvatata iti?  yasmādanyo 'ṅkuro 'nyadbījam,  na ca yadeva bījaṃ sa evāṅkuraḥ /  atha ca punarbījaṃ nirudhyate,  aṅkuraścotpadyate /  ato na śāśvatataḥ //
tgt_original: 言非常者，此種滅故言非常。

src_original: kathaṃ punarnocchedataḥ?  na ca pūrvaniruddhādbījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate,  nāpyaniruddhādbījāt /  api ca bījaṃ ca nirudhyate,  tasminneva samaye 'ṅkura utpadyate,
tgt_original: 即此時種滅、即此時芽生，以無障礙故，如稱低起，故言非斷。

src_original: pratītyasamutpāda iti kasmāducyate?  sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko nāpratyaya ityucyate /  atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /  katamābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate?  hetūpanibandhataḥ pratyayopanibandhataśceti /
tgt_original: 一從因、二從緣。

src_original: tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat /  ato nocchedataḥ //  kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ?  visadṛśo bījādaṅkura ityato na saṃkrāntitaḥ //
tgt_original: 種與芽亦不相似，故言非傳度。

src_original: kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ?  parīttaṃ bījamupyate(vyāptitvāt - avyā)  vipulaṃ phalamabhinirvartayati,  ityataḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ //
tgt_original: 所種種少、收子滋多，故言藉緣故果實增廣。

src_original: yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate tādṛśaṃ phalamabhinirvartayati,
tgt_original: 如是從花故生子，應如理安。

src_original: ityataḥ tatsadṛśānubandhataśceti /  evaṃ bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ //
tgt_original: 如是外因緣，應二種觀察。 如是內因緣義，亦應二種觀察： 一從因、二從緣。

src_original: (MŚālSū, Vaidya 110) tatra punaścādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamaḥ?
tgt_original: 其內緣從因義何也？

src_original: yadidamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ,  yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti /  avidyā cennābhaviṣyat,
tgt_original: 所言無明緣行、行緣識、識緣名色、名色緣六入、六入緣觸、觸緣受、受緣愛、愛緣取、取緣有、有緣生、生緣老死憂悲苦惱，次第增長。

src_original: naivaṃ saṃskārāḥ prajñāsyante /  evaṃ yāvadyadi jātirnābhaviṣyat(skandhānāṃ pañcānāṃ prādurbhāvo jātiriti)
tgt_original: 如是等苦陰聚集增長，如是有無明故行增長，如是乃至有生故老死增長。

src_original: , tatra jarāmaraṇaṃ na prajñāsyate /  atha ca satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇāmabhinirvṛttirbhavatīti /
tgt_original: 若無無明則不生行，若無生則無老死，如是有無明故有行增長，如是有生故有老死增長。

src_original: tatrāvidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ saṃskārānabhinirvartayāmīti /  punaḥ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmapyevaṃ na bhavati - vayamavidyayā abhinirvartitā iti /  evaṃ yāvajjāteḥ(skandhaprādurbhāvasya)  naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirvartayāmīti /  jarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ jātyābhinirvartita iti /
tgt_original: 其無明亦不念言我能造行、行亦不念言我為無明所造，乃至生亦不言我能造老死、老死亦不言我為生所造。
